content.body: I think this depends on whether you see `export` as part of the class declaration or not
iirc TSC sees export as a modifier of the class (like abstract), but I see it as a separate thing and I would find it very confusing to not have the class immediately after the decorator
* iirc TSC sees export as a modifier of the class (like abstract), but I see it as a separate thing and I would find it very confusing to not have the class immediately after the decorator

m.new_content.body: iirc TSC sees export as a modifier of the class (like abstract), but I see it as a separate thing and I would find it very confusing to not have the class immediately after the decorator

content.body: I also am unhappy with decorators after export, I think it'll be particularly annoying if we ever make function decorators
